get.summary: Gets list of Reachability Analysis Intents .

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client API version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: networkManagerName
parameters.description: The name of the network manager.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Workspace name.

parameters.name: skipToken
parameters.description: Optional skip token.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Optional num entries to skip.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Optional num entries to show.

parameters.name: sortKey
parameters.description: Optional key by which to sort.

parameters.name: sortValue
parameters.description: Optional sort value for pagination.

items.description: Configuration information or intent on which to do the analysis on.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: The system metadata related to this resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

properties.description: Represents the Reachability Analysis Intent properties.

sourceResourceId.description: Source resource id to verify the reachability path of.

destinationResourceId.description: Destination resource id to verify the reachability path of.

items.description: Source IP address of the traffic..

sourceIps.description: List of source IP addresses of the traffic..

items.description: Destination IP address of the traffic..

destinationIps.description: List of destination IP addresses of the traffic..

items.description: The source port.

sourcePorts.description: The source ports of the traffic.

items.description: The destination port.

destinationPorts.description: The destination ports of the traffic.

items.description: Network protocol this resource applies to.

value.description: Gets a page of Reachability Analysis Intents

nextLink.description: Gets the URL to get the next page of results.

schema.description: A list of Reachability Analysis Intents.
